abcd:ContentContact.abcd:Address: Museum für Naturkunde Berlin, Invalidenstraße 43, 10115 Berlin, Germany

abcd:TaxonIdentified.abcd:NameComments: Treated [as ' remedios Schröder, 1980' ] as a species of Appias Hübner, 1820 by Yata (1985: 390). Treated as a species of Appias Hübner, [1819] by Bridges (1988: II.5). Treated as a species of Appias by Treadaway (1995: 24).

abcd:Gathering.abcd:AreaDetail: Philippinen, Insel Panay, Antique, Culasi, 500 m.

abcd:Unit.abcd:Notes: Current type depository: coll. C. G. Treadaway, Frankfurt // Cited type material: Holotypus [m], [...], Th. Borromeo leg. 29. April 1980. coll. C. G. Treadaway, Frankfurt am Main. // Other remarks:

abcd:TaxonIdentified.abcd:NameComments: Treated as a subspecies of Aporia hippia (Bremer, 1861) by Della Bruna et al. (2004: 19, 24).

abcd:Gathering.abcd:AreaDetail: Kansu mer. or. Peilingschan, Taupingfluß, Lihsien, 2500-3000 m

abcd:Unit.abcd:Notes: Current type depository: MFNB, Berlin; SMTD, Dresden; ZFMK, Bonn (1 syntype) // Cited type material: Juni - Juli. [...] [m] [...] [f] // Other remarks:

abcd:TaxonIdentified.abcd:NameComments: Treated as a subspecies of Aporia bieti (Oberthür, 1884) by Della Bruna et al. (2004: 19, 27).

abcd:Gathering.abcd:AreaDetail: Kansu mer. or., Taupingfluß, Lihsien, 2500 m

abcd:Unit.abcd:Notes: Current type depository: MFNB, Berlin; SMTD, Dresden ? // Cited type material: bei einigen [mm] [...] die wenigen [ff] // Other remarks:

abcd:TaxonIdentified.abcd:NameComments: Treated as a subspecies of Aporia delavayi (Oberthür, 1890) by Della Bruna et al. (2004: 20, 42).

abcd:Gathering.abcd:AreaDetail: Kansu mer. or., Minschan or., 3000 m

abcd:Unit.abcd:Notes: Current type depository: MFNB, Berlin; SMTD, Dresden ? // Cited type material: Juli. [...] 2 [mm] // Other remarks:

abcd:TaxonIdentified.abcd:NameComments: Treated as a synonym (infrasubspezific taxon) of Archon apollinaris (Staudinger, [1892]) by Hesselbarth et al. (1995: 264).

abcd:Unit.abcd:Notes: Current type depository: MFNB, Berlin ? // Cited type material: Zwergform des [f] // Other remarks: Date of publication after Griffin (1936): 27.III.1907. Name originally attributed to ' Stgr. i. l.' .

abcd:TaxonIdentified.abcd:NameComments: Treated as a subspecies (' v.' ) of Doritis apollinus Hbst. by Staudinger (1901: 4). Treated as a subspecies (' Form' ) of Doritis apollinus Hbst. by Stichel (1907: 19). Treated as a species of Archon Hübner, [1822] by Häuser (1993: 138). Treated as a species of Archon Hübner, 1822 by Hesselbarth et al. (1995: 264).

abcd:Gathering.abcd:AreaDetail: bei Goman Otti im nordöstlichen Kleinasien etwa 1500 Meter hoch

abcd:Unit.abcd:Notes: Current type depository: MFNB, Berlin // Cited type material: eine in Anzahl von Dr. Plason erhaltene kleine blasse Lokalrasse, die [...] gefangen wurde. [...] nur bei einigen [ff] [...] Einige Männcehn haben // Other remarks: Lectotype designated by Hesselbarth et al. (1995: 264). For a long time treated as a subspecies of A. apollinus (e.g., Ackery 1975, Bryk 1934, D'Abrera 1990, Igarashi 1979, Collins & Morris 1985, Hancock 1983), but now generally accepted as a distinct species based on the sympatric occurence with A. apollinus in part of its range (Carbonell 1991, de Freina 1985, Hesselbarth et al. 1995).

abcd:TaxonIdentified.abcd:NameComments: Treated as a subspecies (' v.' ) of Doritis apollinus Hbst. by Staudinger (1901: 4). Treated as a subspecies (' Form' ) of Doritis apollinus Hbst. by Stichel (1907: 19). Treated as a synonym of Archon apollinus apollinus (Herbst, 1798) by Hesselbarth et al. (1995: 260).

abcd:Unit.abcd:Notes: Current type depository: MFNB, Berlin; RMNH, Leiden ? // Cited type material: die wir in ziemlicher Anzahl aus Puppen erzogen, [...] Besonders bei den [ff] // Other remarks: 2 PT (1 male, 1 female) in coll. C. Eisner in RMNH, Leiden (Eisner 1954:51).

abcd:TaxonIdentified.abcd:NameComments: Treated as conspecific (' ab. [f]' ) with Doritis apollinus Hbst. by Stichel (1907:18).

abcd:Gathering.abcd:AreaDetail: von Aintab aus dem südlichen Kleinasien (etwas nördlich von Antiochien gelegen)

abcd:Unit.abcd:Notes: Current type depository: MFNB, Berlin // Cited type material: Als ab. Rubra versandten wir Weibchen [...] Wir erzogen diese prachtvolle Aberration in kleiner Anzahl ausschießlich aus Puppen, die uns mein leiber Freund Manissadjian [...] sandte. // Other remarks:

abcd:TaxonIdentified.abcd:NameComments: Treated as a synonym of Archon apollinus apollinus (Herbst, 1798) by Hesselbarth et al. (1995: 260).

abcd:Unit.abcd:Notes: Current type depository: BMNH, London (4 syntypes); SMNK, Karlsruhe (1 syntype); ZFMK, Bonn (3 syntypes); SMTD, Dresden (9 syntypes); ZSSM, Munich (2 syntypes); ZMKU, Kiev; RMNH, Leiden; NHMW, Vienna (2 [mm], 4 [ff], syntypes) // Cited type material: Von [...] erhielt ich eine große Serie beider Geschlechter (über 200 Stück), die von G. Rückbeil [...] gesammelt wurde. // Other remarks: 12 syntypes (6 males, 6 females, ex coll. Sheljuzhko) in coll. C. Eisner in RMNH, Leiden (Eisner 1954:52). 4 ST in BMNH, London; 1 ST (female) in SMNK, Karlsruhe; 3 ST (2 males, 1 female) in ZFMK, Bonn [notes by C. Häuser].

abcd:TaxonIdentified.abcd:NameComments: Treated as a subspecies of Archon apollinus (Herbst, 1798) by Hesselbarth et al. (1995:263).

abcd:Gathering.abcd:AreaDetail: Türkei, Ambarli/Cekmece, Thrazien [...] etwa 40 km westlich vom Stadtzentrum Istanbuls. Entfernung zur Küste ca 4 km, Höhe über NN etwa 60 m.

abcd:Unit.abcd:Notes: Current type depository: ZFMK, Bonn // Cited type material: Holotypus: [f]: [...] 28. 3.-8. 4. 1972, leg. K. H. Nikodemus, coll. Zoologisches Forschungsinstitut und Museum Alexander Koenig (ZFMK). // Other remarks:
